ruling: - You can return a face-down "Cyberdark" monster to your Deck for the effect of this card, but you must show it to your opponent.
- You can return a "Cyberdark" monster that is being treated as a Spell Card (by [[Relinquished]], etc.) to your Deck with the effect of this card.
- You cannot use a Fusion substitute monster like [[Goddess with the Third Eye]] with this card.
